title: Get Started
description: A step-by-step introduction to DVC by building a simple NLP project from scratch.

courses.title: Initialize
courses.description: Install DVC, create a Git project, and initialize DVC.

courses.title: Data Tracking
courses.description: Track data files and datasets with DVC.

courses.title: Data Sharing
courses.description: Setup a data storage and push/pull cached data to it.

courses.title: Importing Data
courses.description: Import data from another DVC project.

courses.title: Stages
courses.description: Process data and generate outputs in a reproducible way.

courses.title: Pipelines
courses.description: Connect stages by outputs and dependencies, to create a dependency graph (or a data pipeline).

courses.title: Experiments and Metrics
courses.description: Try different approaches or solutions and compare their results.

courses.title: Data Versioning
courses.description: Checkout previous versions of code and data.
